Actions.Name: Incentivize
Actions.Description: The [name] either puts down a valuables token in range, or allows an ally in range 3 to dash 3.

Actions.Name: Weight of Conscience
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range 5. While marked, the foe can only move a maximum of 3 spaces a round, no matter their abilities or speed. A foe can end this mark by not moving at all for their entire turn.

Actions.Name: Lift Burdens
Actions.Description: The [name] marks an ally in range 5. While marked, the ally gains flying, evasion, dodge and their attacks deal bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Collect
Actions.Description: Every foe on the battlefield sacrifices down to 50% of their maximum hp. Foes at 50% hp sacrifice down to 25%. Foes at 25% hp or lower are defeated.
